channel.title: Item Recolor Tool + Lists 15 TOOLS in ONE FILE! [HWPT V2] [@]
channel.description:
Since this is not allowed in the download section as it is a BAT file, this should be able to withstand in this section. As this is development and help, plus showing off - this fits in both of those! I'll perhaps release more versions later, maybe some ideas? [hr]
[b]Pictures:[/b]
[img]http://img29.picoodle.com/data/img29/3/9/12/f_3m_74bbe90.png[/img]
[b]What this does:[/b] This is a helpful programed designed to help you create recolored items. Now, you do not have to know what ID of the color is, it'll figure out for you, all you do is write the color name, and it'll write it in this file. Then, it'll log the file - this also contains things for your server, like lists. If you have any trouble, go to the info section via main menu.
(Select one) [b]Download link: http://files.filefront.com/HWPT+V2txt/;11771710;/fileinfo.html Download link: http://uppit.com/FBXQ6U[/b]
[b]Features:[/b]
[*]10 Item Makers [*]Color Gen v4 [*]Easy interfaces [*]Alphabetical order coord list [*]No glitches? [*]Easy to use [*]Logs your code [*]Many options [*]Unique color picking system
[b]More Pictures:[/b]
[img]http://img27.picoodle.com/data/img27/3/9/12/f_2m_f7ee38e.png[/img]
[img]http://img37.picoodle.com/data/img37/3/9/12/f_1m_5ed69cf.png[/img]
[img]http://img37.picoodle.com/data/img37/3/9/12/f_4m_6717f4a.png[/img]
[b]Download link:[/b]
Once again, here is a link to download it!
[b]Download link: http://files.filefront.com/HWPT+V2txt/;11771710;/fileinfo.html Download link: http://uppit.com/FBXQ6U[/b]
[b]Need help?[/b]
Post here if you need any help, which you shouldn't really have as this is simple - but oh well, people need help you know?
